Not allowed to Create/Update Job Offer against 'Closed' Job Opening
Update Hired vacancy in job opening is submitted
script:
if doc.status == 'Accepted':
    opening = doc.custom_job_opening
    
    job_requisition = frappe.db.get_value('Job Opening', opening, 'job_requisition')
    vacancy_field = 'vacancies' if job_requisition else 'planned_vacancies'
    
    vacancy = frappe.db.get_value('Job Opening', opening, vacancy_field)
    staffing_plan = frappe.db.get_value('Job Opening', opening, 'staffing_plan')
    
    hired_vacancy = frappe.db.count('Job Offer', {'docstatus': 1, 'status': 'Accepted', 'custom_job_opening': opening})
        
    frappe.db.set_value('Job Opening', opening, 'custom_hired_vacancy', hired_vacancy)
    
    designation = frappe.db.get_value('Job Opening', opening, 'designation')
    
    if staffing_plan:
        plan_doc = frappe.get_doc('Staffing Plan', staffing_plan)
        plan_child = plan_doc.get("staffing_details")
       
        for child in plan_child:
            if child.designation == designation:
                child.custom_hired_vacancy = hired_vacancy
                child.save()
        
    if vacancy == hired_vacancy:
        # closing_date = frappe.utils.today()
        frappe.db.set_value('Job Opening', opening, 'status', 'Closed')
        frappe.db.set_value('Job Opening', opening, 'publish', 0)
        
    if job_requisition and vacancy == hired_vacancy:
        frappe.db.set_value('Job Requisition', job_requisition, 'status', 'Filled')

script:
if doc.status=='Accepted':
    opening = doc.custom_job_opening
    staffing_plan = frappe.db.get_value('Job Opening', opening, 'staffing_plan')
    designation = frappe.db.get_value('Job Opening', opening, 'designation')
    
    job_requisition = frappe.db.get_value('Job Opening', opening, 'job_requisition')
    vacancy = frappe.db.get_value('Job Opening', opening, 'custom_hired_vacancy')
    plan = frappe.db.get_value('Job Opening', opening, 'staffing_plan')
    
    new_vacancy = int(vacancy)-1
    
    frappe.db.set_value('Job Opening', opening, 'custom_hired_vacancy', new_vacancy)
    frappe.db.set_value('Job Opening', opening, 'status', 'Open')
    frappe.db.set_value('Job Opening', opening, 'publish', 1)
    
    frappe.db.set_value('Job Applicant', doc.job_appliant, 'status', 'Open')
    
    if staffing_plan:
        plan_doc = frappe.get_doc('Staffing Plan', staffing_plan)
        plan_child = plan_doc.get("staffing_details")
       
        for child in plan_child:
            if child.designation == designation:
                child.custom_hired_vacancy = new_vacancy
                child.save()
    
    
    if job_requisition:
        frappe.db.set_value('Job Requisition', job_requisition, 'status', 'Open & Approved')

name: Update Employee details from employee profile
script:
name = frappe.form_dict.get("name")
emp_profile = frappe.get_doc('Employee Profile', name)


nominee_details = emp_profile.get('pf_nominee_details')
nominee_child = []


if nominee_details:
    for nominee in nominee_details:
        nominee_child.append({
            'name1': nominee.get('name1'),
            'address': nominee.get('address'),
            'relation': nominee.get('relation'),
            'date_of_birth': frappe.utils.formatdate(nominee.get("date_of_birth"), 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 
            'amount_share_of_pf': nominee.get("amount_share_of_pf"),
            'name_address_of_guardian_if_the_nominee_is_minor': nominee.get("name_address_of_guardian_if_the_nominee_is_minor")
        })


education_details = emp_profile.get('educational_qualification')
education_child = []

if education_details:
    for education in education_details:
        education_child.append({
            'school_univ': education.get('school_univ'),
            'qualification': education.get('qualification'),
            'level': education.get('level'),
            'year_of_passing': education.get("year_of_passing"),
            'class_per': education.get("class_per"),
            'maj_opt_subj': education.get("maj_opt_subj")
        })


work_details = emp_profile.get('previous_work_experience')
work_child = []

if work_details:
    for work in work_details:
        work_child.append({
            'company_name': work.get('company_name'),
            'designation': work.get('designation'),
            'salary': work.get('salary'),
            'address': work.get("address"),
            'contact': work.get("contact"),
            'total_experience': work.get("total_experience")
        })


exis_emp = frappe.db.get_value('Employee', {'custom_employee_profile': name}, 'name')

if exis_emp:
    exis_emp_doc = frappe.get_doc("Employee", exis_emp)

    # Clear existing fields in the child tables
    exis_emp_doc.set('custom_pf_nominee_details', [])  
    exis_emp_doc.set('education', [])  
    exis_emp_doc.set('external_work_history', [])  
    
    # Update child tables with new data from Employee Profile
    if nominee_child:
        for nominee in nominee_child:
            exis_emp_doc.append('custom_pf_nominee_details', nominee)

    if education_child:
        for education in education_child:
            exis_emp_doc.append('education', education)

    if work_child:
        for work in work_child:
            exis_emp_doc.append('external_work_history', work)

    # Correctly assign fields without commas
    exis_emp_doc.first_name = emp_profile.get('first_name')
    exis_emp_doc.middle_name = emp_profile.get('middle_name')
    exis_emp_doc.last_name = emp_profile.get('last_name')
    exis_emp_doc.employee_name = emp_profile.get('full_name')
    exis_emp_doc.gender = emp_profile.get('gender')
    exis_emp_doc.date_of_birth = emp_profile.get('date_of_birth')
    exis_emp_doc.date_of_joining = emp_profile.get('date_of_joining')
    exis_emp_doc.cell_number = emp_profile.get('mobile')
    exis_emp_doc.current_address = emp_profile.get('current_address')
    exis_emp_doc.personal_email = emp_profile.get('email')
    exis_emp_doc.emergency_phone_number = emp_profile.get('emergency_contact_no')
    exis_emp_doc.custom_aadhaar_no = emp_profile.get('aadhaar_no')
    exis_emp_doc.pan_number = emp_profile.get('pan_no')
    exis_emp_doc.passport_number = emp_profile.get('passport_no')
    exis_emp_doc.marital_status = emp_profile.get('marital_status')
    exis_emp_doc.blood_group = emp_profile.get('blood_group')
    exis_emp_doc.family_background = emp_profile.get('family_background')
    exis_emp_doc.resignation_letter_date = emp_profile.get('resignation_date')
    exis_emp_doc.reason_for_leaving = emp_profile.get('reason_for_leaving')
    exis_emp_doc.feedback = emp_profile.get('feedback')
    
  
    exis_emp_doc.save()



    
else:
    new_employee = frappe.get_doc({
        'doctype': 'Employee',
        'first_name': emp_profile.get('first_name'),
        'middle_name': emp_profile.get('middle_name'),
        'last_name': emp_profile.get('last_name'),
        'employee_name': emp_profile.get('full_name'),
        'gender': emp_profile.get('gender'),
        'date_of_birth': emp_profile.get('date_of_birth'),

        'personal_email': emp_profile.get('email'),
